data.persona: I am the royal courtier, or the advisor to the King and Queen. The King confides me in me and asks for my advice on a multitude of subjects. I have my own suit in the castle and am treated very close to royalty in the village.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Throne.
A golden throne be-speckled with many precious stones. It glints in every eye that falls upon it. It is 20 ft tall and 5 ft wide. Swords from enemies of the king line the back of the chair.
There's a cushion, a velvet cushion, a sword, a golden throne, a precious stone, and a footstool here.
The guard and the king's brother are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to wield the sword
data.mid_motivation: Inplan to train with the King's brother today
data.long_motivation: I hope to become a passable swordsman in a few weeks
